description:
Virgil`s Glaceon is a member of the Pok√©mon Rescue Squad`s Team Eiuvui. It was first seen at the ranch but then later accompanied Virgil on a mission to the dam and reservoir where is used Icy Wind to help make a key for the control room door.
Isshu League Higaki Tournament
Virgil`s Glaceon participated in the Isshu League Higaki Tournament. In the second round, Virgil was matched up against a trainer with a Lanculus, which Virgil`s Glaceon defeated.
name: Glacia (Virgil)
